articles.description: Gangs of Godavari, starring Vishwak Sen, along with two other films—Bhaje Bhaje Vaayu Vegam and Gam Gam Ganesha—hit theaters on May 31st. Among these, Vishwak Sen's film had a strong opening.
articles.content:
Gangs of Godavari, starring Vishwak Sen, along with two other films—Bhaje Bhaje Vaayu Vegam and Gam Gam Ganesha—hit theaters on May 31st. Among these, Vishwak Sen's film had a strong opening.
